title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the DigitalDemocracyPlatform, including functional and non-functional requirements, user stories, use cases, data models, system architecture, and integration points with external systems (e.g., government databases, social media platforms).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, data flow, and integration points.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the platform, including wireframes, mockups, and prototypes.

title: Design Data Model and Database Schema
description: Design the data model and database schema to support the platform's functionality and requirements.

title: Develop AI Components
description: Develop and integrate AI components for facilitating informed discussion, voting, and collaborative decision-making.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Implement backend services and APIs to support the platform's functionality and integrate with the AI components.
dependencies: Design Data Model and Database Schema

title: Implement Frontend Components
description: Implement frontend components and user interfaces based on the designed wireframes, mockups, and prototypes.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environments
description: Set up development and testing environments, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, data encryption, and vulnerability testing.

title: Develop Test Plans and Test Cases
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and test cases to ensure the platform's functionality and quality.

title: Conduct Integration and System Testing
description: Conduct integration and system testing to ensure all components work together seamlessly and meet the defined requirements.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation and user guides for the platform, including installation, configuration, and usage instructions.

title: Deploy and Launch the Platform
description: Deploy and launch the DigitalDemocracyPlatform, including setting up production environments, data migration, and user onboarding.
